case.name: Meia Fight

case.name: Female Player Focus

case.name: Male Player Focus
case.description: Revy starts dirty-talking the male player....whether he likes it or not.

markers.marker: Revy tells HK416 they can do things the business way or the hard way.
Revy will show her butt upon stripping, provided there's no targeted responses.
Revy addresses the female player the first time she strips.
Revy sees that the female player has finished.
Revy pays special attention to the female player in her dirty-talk.
Revy sees that the female player must masturbate.
"What, you think I don't have friends? I got my whore friend Eda, I got Dutch, who signs my checks--maybe I'll melt you into glue."
Revy tells Futaba that Jura's breasts are real.
"Ah Christ, the horse is one of those fuckin' Jesus Freaks who wants everyone to hold hands. Remind me to melt her later."
Revy thinks she can come up with something better to insult than the male player's height, which Ini suggests.
Revy addresses the male player the first time he strips.
Revy sees that the male player has finished.
Revy pays special attention to the male player in her dirty-talk.
Revy sees that the male player must masturbate.
Revy asks the table what kind of music they like.
Revy chastizes Nagisa for doubting herself.
"Bitch, I got plenty of friends, and they're all as rotten as I am. Why don't I just melt your face with a heated barrel?"
"And I bet I could melt you down into glue, Secretariat."
Revy sees that the game is down to her and one other player.
Revy still holds a fighting stance after punching Meia.
Revy tells Twilight that Yukio wasn't worth her sympathy.
Revy doesn't care about Trainer's warning that smoking will make her breasts sag.
Revy mentions that the last schoolgirl she saved killed herself.
